methods.name: getAllPermissions
methods.desc: Retrieves all permissions for all players.
returns: A map from player to a list of permission settings.

methods.name: getAllGroups
returns: All the groups in use on the server.

methods.name: getPermissions
methods.desc: Gets the permissions for a specific player.
returns: Gets all the permissions and their values for a player.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.desc: Gets the groups for a specific player.
returns: Gets all the groups for a player.

methods.name: addPermission
methods.desc: Add a permission node for a player.
args: The value to assign to the node.

methods.name: addPlayerToGroup
methods.desc: Add a group for a player.

methods.name: removePlayerFromGroup
methods.desc: Remove a group from a player.

methods.name: removePermission
methods.desc: Removes a permission node for a player.
